s81.literal: Enfeoffed as Marquis as son of Xiaohui.
s81.idiomatic: Enfeoffed as Marquis as Emperor Xiaohui's son.

s82.literal: Enfeoffed on the xinsi day of the fourth month, in the sixth year became King of Huaiyang.
s82.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the xinsi day of the fourth month. In the sixth year, became King of Huaiyang.

s84.literal: Enfeoffed as Marquis as son of Xiaohui.
s84.idiomatic: Enfeoffed as Marquis as Emperor Xiaohui's son.

s85.literal: Enfeoffed on the guiwei day of the second month, in the seventh year became Lü King.
s85.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guiwei day of the second month. In the seventh year, became Lü King.

s87.idiomatic: Enfeoffed as Marquis as Emperor Xiaohui's son.

s88.literal: 二月癸未封，七年，為東牟侯。
s88.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guiwei day of the second month. In the seventh year, became Marquis of Dongmou.
